opinion.post: During a recent bible study our group decided to dissect the available information informationon the Shroud .  A curiosity arose when we sort of ran out of all evidence and speculationsand we focused on the shin a “E” symbol on the forehead often suggested as a run of ABblood precipitated by the crown of thorns. Upon using a HD photo image with a series ofenlargements or zooms we captured the image of a crucified man on a cross head turnedto the right.
